HediffDef.label: yautja claws
HediffDef.description: small pointed claws protruding from the fingers

HediffDef.label: head crest
HediffDef.description: A crest that grows off the back of the scalp

HediffDef.label: leathery skin
HediffDef.description: The skin is thick and leathery, forming a hearty barrier between you and the outside world. The small scales that pepper the skin aid you in damage resistance.

HediffDef.label: yautja upper mandibles
HediffDef.description: A finger-like digit that sprouts from the cheekbone and possesses a sharp tooth.

HediffDef.label: yautja superior upper mandibles
HediffDef.description: A finger-like digit that sprouts from the outer cheekbone and possesses a sharp tooth.

HediffDef.label: yautja lower mandibles
HediffDef.description: A finger-like digit that sprouts from the jawline and possesses a sharp tooth.

HediffDef.label: yautja lower mandible
HediffDef.description: A finger-like digit that sprouts from the center of the chin and possesses a sharp tooth.

HediffDef.label: yautja superior lower mandibles
HediffDef.description: A finger-like digit that sprouts from the outer jawline and possesses a sharp tooth.

HediffDef.label: yautja paired mandibles
HediffDef.description: An array of finger-like digits that sprout from the face and possess a sharp tooth. While many arrangements of mandibles are modular, these are locked as a specific layout.
